tidbits.title: Pristine Beaches
tidbits.description: Seychelles is renowned for its stunning, pristine beaches with crystal-clear waters and white sands, offering a paradise-like setting for visitors.

tidbits.title: Unique Flora and Fauna
tidbits.description: The islands host unique biodiversity, including the rare Coco de Mer palm and a variety of endemic species like the Aldabra giant tortoise.

tidbits.title: Creole Culture
tidbits.description: Seychellois culture is a vibrant mix of African, Asian, and European influences, reflected in their language, music, dance, and cuisine.
